document.full_text: rory mcilroy birdied his final hole to take a two-stroke lead saturday in the weather-hit malaysian open, while masters champion charl schwartzel barely made the cut for the third round.
document.title: mcilroy takes 2-stroke lead at malaysian open
lines_and_colors: rory mcilroy birdied his final hole to take a two-stroke lead saturday in the weather-hit malaysian open, while masters champion charl schwartzel barely made the cut for the third round.
